remarks: Split a finite product into two parts.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Dec-2017.)
statement:
fprodsplit.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A i^i B ) = (/) ) $.
fprodsplit.2 $e |- ( ph -> U = ( A u. B ) ) $.
fprodsplit.3 $e |- ( ph -> U e. Fin ) $.
fprodsplit.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. U ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprodsplit $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. U C = ( prod_ k e. A C x. prod_ k e. B C ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d U k $.
$d k ph $.
